'''Chapter I''' is the [[Archon Quest]] chapter set in the nation of [[Liyue]].

{{Quote|The God of Contracts, senselessly slaughtered as his people watched on in horror. In the end, he will sign the contract to end all contracts.|[[Dainsleif]]|[[Teyvat Chapter Storyline Preview: Travail|Teyvat Chapter Storyline Preview]]<ref>YouTube: [https://youtu.be/TAlKhARUcoY Teyvat Chapter Storyline Preview]</ref>}}
__TOC__

==List of Acts==
* Act I - [[Of the Land Amidst Monoliths]]
** Requirements: {{Quest|23;Song of the Dragon and Freedom|requirements=1}}.
* Act II - [[Farewell, Archaic Lord]]
** Requirements: {{Quest|25|requirements=1}}.
* Act III - [[A New Star Approaches]]
** Requirements: {{Quest|28|requirements=1}}.
* Act IV - [[We Will Be Reunited]]
** Requirements: {{Quest|28;The Meaning of Lupical;Bough Keeper: Dainsleif|display=bullet|requirements=1}}
